summary:
Ethereum miners generated about $756 million in revenue in August.
It was the last full month of mining activity before the network shifts from proof-of-work to proof-of-stake later this month.Â
author: Michael McSweeney
The Block
title: Ethereum miners made $756 million in revenue in August ahead of the Merge
content: Ethereum miners generated $756 million in revenue in August, up 37% from July's$545 million revenue.

Just over $30 million of that amount constituted transaction fees — that is, ETH paid for transactions to be included in the blocks — with the rest as block subsidies to miners, according to data collected by The Block Research.
